title: How to Prepare a Paid UPS Shipping Label Online

steps.title: Access the UPS page.
steps.content: Access the UPS page . Select your native language and country of origin from the drop-down list.

steps.title: Log in with your UPS.com credentials.
steps.content: Log in with your UPS.com credentials. Click the "Log-In" link and fill in all the appropriate details for your username and password.

steps.title: Hover over the "Shipping" tab near the top of the page and click "Create a Shipment".
steps.content: Hover over the "Shipping" tab near the top of the page and click "Create a Shipment".

steps.title: Fill in the ship-to address under "1 Where is this shipment going?".
steps.content: Fill in the ship-to address under "1 Where is this shipment going?". If you have addresses stored in your UPS address book, you can access them from the drop-down list, or you can type in a new address from the text boxes below that drop-down box.

steps.title: Fill out the return address lines or select from one of the addresses.
steps.content: Fill out the return address lines or select from one of the addresses. You'll find this section under "2) Where is this shipment coming from?"

steps.title: Explain the types and quantity of packages you are shipping.
steps.content: Explain the types and quantity of packages you are shipping. Use the drop-down list under "3) What are you shipping?" Fill out the weight and size descriptions of the package. This will only be available after you select a packaging type from the drop-down list.

steps.title: Describe what type of UPS services you want under "4) How would you like to ship?"
steps.content: Describe what type of UPS services you want under "4) How would you like to ship?" Click the checkboxes next to any additional services you might want or need. Some services are free, while others there might be a separate charge for.

steps.title: Skip down to "How would you like to pay?"
steps.content: Skip down to "How would you like to pay?" and fill in the appropriate details. UPS allows PayPal billing orders, if you have a PayPal account and are able to log in to confirm your purchase.

steps.title: Ensure that the checkbox next to ""Review Shipping details, including price, before completing this shipment" to ensure the address you entered is standardized to UPS policy.
steps.content: Ensure that the checkbox next to ""Review Shipping details, including price, before completing this shipment" to ensure the address you entered is standardized to UPS policy.

steps.title: Click the "Next" button from the right hand side of the page below the "Review Shipment details" checkbox line.
steps.content: Click the "Next" button from the right hand side of the page below the "Review Shipment details" checkbox line.

steps.title: Double check your selections.
steps.content: Double check your selections. If you want to, you can select the checkbox to the left of the option

steps.title: Click the "Ship Now" button at the bottom right hand side of the page.
steps.content: Click the "Ship Now" button at the bottom right hand side of the page.

steps.title: Print the label and send via a UPS store or other UPS location.
steps.content: Print the label and send via a UPS store or other UPS location.
